text: I sent a quick email to Dorothy this morning with some high level thoughts. still haven't heard back. will let you know when I do.
I think we should hone in on some leading candidates for things that could be built / retrofitted in a few weeks time.
Im happy work out whatever - but do we have have enough info to even know what our leading candidates are?

no but they don't strike me as the type to have info for us - they're looking for us to lead with some initial thoughts. Even if they're predicated on a shit ton of assumptions, let's just put forth something we like.
so then - perhaps we could start by crafting the scenario in which this installation exists?
but honestly, I'm down for anything
just trying to figure out how to get a foothold
yeah, if it helps to put guardrails, imagine a scenario - evening exclusive party, some ritzy NYC or LA penthouse suite, this sits in an area that is inviting but not obtrusive.
alt. scenario. same location as above, but this is more prominent

It's only getting used for this one event, and afterwards it doesn't exist. The event is attended by industry people, VIPs, and die-hard Rihanna fans - so people are aware of who she is and knowledgable on her music.
should we set up some time this afternoon to push this all forward a little?
sure - does 2:30 work for folks?
works for me
cool - I'll come find you. everyone else?
or anyone else?
I'm here if you want me there
i'll come
got a meeting @ 2:30, but p sure you guys will be fine w/o me
cool let's meet in the suite 390 conf room
<@U026103R3> report to 390
sorry
coming
